name: Outline
title: getoutline.com
shortDescription: Outline is a team knowledge base designed to organize and streamline access to company documents. It offers real-time collaboration, powerful search capabilities, and integrations with tools like Slack. Ideal for teams seeking to centralize information and improve document management, Outline allows for public and private sharing, ensuring that relevant stakeholders can access necessary documents efficiently.
pros: Powerful search and AI question answering
Integrations with Slack and other tools
cons: May require training for full feature utilization
Potential privacy concerns with public document sharing
